title: Resident Evil 6 Save Game Editor
description:
I played an hour an a half to beat chapter 1 as leon.

When I joined another players game at a different stage in the game it overwrote

my offline progress.

After re-doining and being stuck as the female character to catch up to where I was I 

I ended up being the guy character again Losing all my gained weapons.

You can use this editor to cheat and get everything

Or you can use it like I did to restore my progress and weapons I had as I progressed.

BE SURE TO BACK UP

(SysDrive):Program Files(x86)Resident Evil 6savessavedata.bin

before editting the file or risk nerfing your legit progress...

Must be run as admin to overwrite the file which is in a protected system location

%Program Files%
